metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6847 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The PoDoFo::PdfVariant::DelayedLoad function in PdfVariant.h in PoDoFo 0.9.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted file. Agostino Sarubbo discovered that PoDoFo mishandled certain crafted PDF files, resulting in a NULL pointer dereference. If PoDoFo were to open a malicious PDF, an attacker could cause PoDoFo to crash.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
